aboutMeText: I am a fullstack web developer with a passion for creating interactive and responsive web applications. I have experience working with JavaScript, React, Next12/14, Redux, React Native, Node.js, Express, Mongoose, HTML, CSS, and Git. I am a fast learner and I am always looking to expand my knowledge and skill set. I am a team player and love to work and exchange ideas with others.
capsule: La Capsule - Coding Bootcamp, Nice, France

bachelor: Bachelor's degree, title: Project Manager - Developer of Web and Mobile Applications

connectText: I'm currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
